mapper.select: SELECT USER_IMG_ID, USER_ID, USER_IMG_NAME, USER_IMG_PATH, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_ID, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_DT, DEL_YN FROM USER_IMAGE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY USER_IMG_ID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO USER_IMAGE ( USER_IMG_ID, USER_ID, USER_IMG_NAME, USER_IMG_PATH, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DT, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_IMAGE.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userImgName}, #{userImgPath}, #{createId}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
SELECT SEQ_USER_IMAGE.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_IMAGE SET USER_IMG_NAME = #{userImgName}, USER_IMG_PATH = #{userImgPath}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_IMG_ID = #{userImgId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE USER_IMAGE SET DEL_YN = 'Y', UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_IMG_ID = #{userImgId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
